page.title: 10RELIGIOUS ATTITUDES
page.content: PRIESTS-St. Anne's C of E. Congregation is increasing. Encourages people to be involved by organisations such as path- finders, guides and Sunday School for younger people-choir for all ages, and groups of adults to help run Church activities. {St.Joseph's R.C.} Father would like younger people to attend. Increase in congregation with older people. Tries to popularize Church by activities such as barn dances and fairs. Tries to encourage children from St. Joseph's school to attend the Church. {PEOPLE'S ATTITUDES}-Young people believe in God, but few go to Church, except at Christmas, Easter and Weddings. More younger and middle aged adults attend church. Most felt that Religious Education should be taught in schools. Those aged 60 plus attended regularly, and had done so since young.
